Detailed Description

This file containes simple demo for using the Python wrapper of the RingDecomposerLib together with RDKit.

usage: 

rdkit_demo.py --input <input_file> [--output]

The program takes as input a molecule file (.smi or .sdf) and reads in every molecule and calculates the ring topology and prints it to stdout.

The parameter --output is optional. If specified, the script will write a number of SVG images, where RCs are marked according to family membership.
